frames.title: S000. Opening Slide for PPS – Sales – Blanket Order Processing

choices.label: About Palco Power Systems and Scott Electric and a Welcome to Training

frames.narr1: Slide S000. Opening Slide for PPS – Sales – Blanket Order Processing — Opening Slide for PPS – Sales – Blanket Order Processing.
frames.narr2: Opening Slide for PPS.
frames.narr3: Palco Power Systems is a specialized power solutions provider and an authorized KOHLER distributor, serving customers across western Pennsylvania, West Virginia, and western Maryland. Since 1972, Palco has supplied reliable generator systems and power equipment to industrial, commercial, municipal, healthcare, and residential customers who depend on uninterrupted power.

frames.narr3: This is the overall Work flow on how a service request is processed at Palco Power System. This covers the business process that starts from a request from a customer or based on a contract the need for a routine service that need to be performed. Request from customers could be for a break fix , a warranty question or request for additional work suggest as a nice to perform during the most recent visit by a very well trained and efficient Service technician crea at PPS. This transistions through the various business sections of Service writes Service  , schedulers , technicians , parts department, purchasing , billing and finally collection of payment. Hence the term Service to Cash is ofen used to succinctly name it

frames.title: M1. Blanket Order Creation and Processing SOP - PPS Sales

choices.label: Contractor places an Order for a Generator- PPS Sales

frames.narr2: Blanket Order Creation and Processing SOP - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: This process is used in both Industrial and Residential sales The process handles both sold from stock generators and Special build generators

frames.title: S1. Contractor places an Order for a Generator- PPS Sales

choices.label: Create a Blanket Order using OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr1: Slide S1. Contractor places an Order for a Generator- PPS Sales — Contractor places an Order for a Generator- PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Contractor places an Order for a Generator- PPS Sales
frames.narr3: The contractor places an order for the generator after reviewing our specifications

frames.title: S2. Create a Blanket Order using OPM - PPS Sales

choices.label: Decision is the Generator a “Modified Build” ? - PPS Sales

frames.narr1: Slide S2. Create a Blanket Order using OPM - PPS Sales — Create a Blanket Order using OPM - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Create a Blanket Order using OPM - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: the process starts with the creation of Blanket Order A blanket order (BL) represents a contract to supply a quantity of goods to be shipped on different dates, and possibly to different locations, over a specified period of time. BLs are automatically converted to blanket releases (BR) when it comes time to ship the products. Use these instructions to create a BL.

frames.title: D1. Decision is the Generator a “Modified Build” ? - PPS Sales
frames.decision_question: Decision Is the Generator a “Modified Build” ?

choices.label: Yes the Order is  “Modified Build” Generator - PPS Sales
No, Generator is not a “Modified Build”

frames.narr1: Slide D1. Decision is the Generator a “Modified Build” ? - PPS Sales — Yes Generator a “Modified Build” ? - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Decision is the Generator a “Modified Build” ? - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: A key decision needs to be taken if the order requires a "modified Generator Build" or a standard unit

frames.title: Y1. Yes, Generator is a “Modified Build” - PPS Sales

choices.label: Create an order with a “Order as needed Stock Item” OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr1: Slide Y1. Yes, Generator is a “Modified Build” - PPS Sales — Yes, Generator is a “Modified Build” - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Yes, Generator is a “Modified Build” - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: In this path it was determined that a modified generator needs to be created

frames.title: S3. Create an order with a “Order as needed Stock Item” OPM - PPS Sales

choices.label: Make the OAN item serialized OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr2: Create an order with a “Order as needed Stock Item” OPM - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: In order to process this order an Item has to be created as with an Order as needed flag set as this is a one of sale

frames.title: S4. Make the OAN item serialized OPM - PPS Sales

choices.label: Add items to the order including Start_Up - OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr1: Slide S4. Make the OAN item serialized OPM - PPS Sales — Make the OAN item serialized OPM - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Make the OAN item serialized OPM - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: since generator have to be serilized and tracked by serial number the item created earlier needs to be serialized. It should be noted in these cases the probability that the serial number is known is very low. However that is entered during the receipt of the unit from the manufacturer

frames.title: S5. Add items to the order including Start_Up - OPM - PPS Sales

choices.label: Add Lump Sum billing- OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr2: Add items to the order including Start_Up - OPM - PPS Sales

frames.title: S6. Add Lump Sum billing- OPM - PPS Sales

choices.label: Decision Does the customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately ? - OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr1: Slide S6. Add Lump Sum billing- OPM - PPS Sales — Add Lump Sum billing- OPM - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Add Lump Sum billing- OPM - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: In most bid jobs the lumpsum bill is used as the individual price (to the customer) is not presented.

frames.title: D2. Decision Does the customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately ? - OPM - PPS Sales
frames.decision_question: Decision Does the customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately ?

choices.label: Yes. Customer  wants the Gen and ATS shipped separately
No, The customer want the Gen and ATS shipped together

frames.narr1: Slide D2. Decision Does the customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately ? - OPM - PPS Sales — Yes the customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately ? - OPM - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Decision Does the customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately ? - OPM - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: Due to varaious factors like size , site readiness , mode of operation even fuel require special preparation and handling hence the customer may choose to have the generator and ATS etc shipped separately or in some case all at one time. Hence this question needs to be answered

frames.title: Y2. Yes The customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately - OPM - PPS Sales

choices.label: Create 3 releases to satisfy the customer’s request - OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr1: Slide Y2. Yes The customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately - OPM - PPS Sales — Yes The customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately - OPM - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Yes The customer want the Gen and ATS shipped separately - OPM - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: in this case the customer has opted for separate shipments of the Generator and ATS

frames.title: S7. Create 3 releases to satisfy the customer’s request - OPM - PPS Sales

choices.label: Run OEEPC and await customer call - OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr1: Slide S7. Create 3 releases to satisfy the customer’s request - OPM - PPS Sales — Create 3 releases to satisfy the customer’s request - OPM - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Create 3 releases to satisfy the customer’s request - OPM - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: As the there are three releases one the generator , two the ats and three the startup service 3 releases need to be added to the blanket orderA blanket release (BR) is a portion of the original blanket order (BL). Each blanket release retains the original BL number, but is assigned a different suffix. You can specify different ship dates and ship to locations for each blanket release.

frames.title: S11. Do Shipping feedback for the picked items – OPM - PPS Sales

choices.label: Goes through the AR billing Process – OPM - PPS Sales

frames.narr1: Slide S11. Do Shipping feedback for the picked items – OPM - PPS Sales — Do Shipping feedback for the picked items – OPM - PPS Sales.
frames.narr2: Do Shipping feedback for the picked items – OPM - PPS Sales
frames.narr3: he same shipping updates that the Sales Shipping Feedback Entry and Transfer Shipping Feedback Entry functions perform are initiated in the WL Entry Batch Shipping Report. This update includes closing the shipping journal and updating General Ledger and Inventory Control. If processing stops before the journal is successfully closed, you must manually close the journal. The journals are not opened by the WL Entry Batch Shipping Report; other functions that open the journals are launched. The report output provides order information and relevant error messages.

This update includes closing the shipping journal and updating General Ledger and Inventory Control. If processing stops before the journal is successfully closed, you must manually close the journal.
